text: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
author: Aesop

text: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

text: Where there is kindness, there is goodness. Where there is goodness, there is magic.

text: Thousands of candles can be lit from a single candle.
author: Buddha

text: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: Be the reason someone believes in the goodness of people.
author: Unknown

text: What you give comes back to you multiplied.
author: Deepak Chopra
